website_summaries.verdict: If chimes hang on a porch and no one hears them, are they really chimes? The set looks good, but opt for the Amazing Grace set.
pros: Two sets of chimes - one inside and one outside - combine for a beautiful sound in an impressive looking display
cons: A stiff breeze is needed to move the chimes, which otherwise lie quiet
Inner striker is prone to rust, and durability is not solid

customer_reviews.title: Magical sounding!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply magical sounding. I bought these for a gift and now want a set of my own.
customer_reviews.author: RogueHistorian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this! I hung it on my peach tree near my patio. Everytime I come out the backdoor I can hear it chiming from the breeze. So peaceful sounding. Its been through a couple of storms and several rains and is no worse for wear. Should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Geekin

customer_reviews.title: Great Chimes!!
customer_reviews.text: The first set I ordered was smaller and had no change in tone. These have a rich tone to them and sound great. Install right out of box and looks and sounds great. Does take a good little breeze to get going but have a beautiful, peaceful sound. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: goodoneleftTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing like a Kvistad chime...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a classically trained musician. So when I decided to get a wind chime, I knew I should get one designed by Garry Kvistad. His creations include actual musical notes, perfectly tuned. For example, I bought one from Woodstock Chimes, with notes from Pachelbel's Canon (which I jokingly call Taco Bell's Cannon!). Kvistad's chime sounds like Philip Glass made a minimalist arrangement of this famous 18th century canon. And I mean that as a sincere compliment. A final "note"... Consider installing the chime where I did. I hung it under our patio umbrella. That way it's protected from the weather, but near us, so we can enjoy the Kvistad chime's incredible overtones.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Russom

customer_reviews.title: Truly beautiful 'music' from the quality piece...worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: These wind chimes make the most beautiful, multi-layered tones. The combination of the larger chimes and the smaller ones in the center is spectacular. And when the chimes are left alone, they continue to 'ring' for another few seconds...good resonance. On the construction side, the supporting cords look to be reinforced for longer life. Most of my chimes have had the strings fail due to being outside in the weather. We are hoping for better string life with this quality piece. The chimes have isolators where the support string passes through (can't see that in the pictures) so there will be minimal wear at the most vulnerable spot. Nice....
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Mallon

customer_reviews.title: Quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are just lovely. The melody is so soothing. Just the right amount of "chiming" that causes relaxation. I am enjoying these chimes more than I anticipated. The chimes are silver and the black wood looks great. I would absolutely purchase these again. Additionally, I must give a giant thumbs up because the packaging was totally cardboard and paper, with no plastic at all. I have not seen another company do this and am really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Rose

customer_reviews.title: music to my ears
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me 2 of these for my birthday, one for the front of my house and one for the back. i absolutely love them. The sound they make is so nice to hear, not clanging but sweet, if that makes any sense. I never get tired of it. It is like soft music in the background while you are talking or if I'm just sitting on my porch drinking coffee it is so soothing, like birds singing in the morning.I very seldom give 5 stars for anything but I don't know how these could be improved. Highly recommend these to anyone that loves to hear sweet chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassed ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so embarrassed! I have purchased Woodstock chimes for over 30 years. I gave these as a gift last night and was absolutely mortified when recipient opened box. The chimes must have been previously returned. The packaging papers were all crinkled up and not packages around the chimes. The tubes and strings were all tangled. And to top it off, the little silicone packaging was ope,n and the beads went flyingeverywhere!!!!! I have purchased these chimes for over 30 years and have never had this happen. Embarrassed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: Higher pitch.  Nice sustain.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely chime. The sustain lasts a LONG time. It must be because of the solid bars. There are two clappers on the center string. One for the large chimes and one for the small solid bars. One of the sound clips that someone posted is a good representation of the long humming sustain. This chime isn't especially loud, but the sound dynamics of the tubes coupled with the bars is a BIG WIN. I would feel comfortable having this item shipped directly to a gift recipient without feeling the need to inspect it first.
customer_reviews.author: BAMOR

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and perfect for the "bronze" anniversary.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful chimes that are relaxing and peaceful in our yard. The "bronze" fit the theme of a 8th wedding anniversary and the chimes appear to be well made enough to last a long time. When looking at other reviewers the comments of how in tune these are stands out, though I do not have an ear for such a tune I can honestly say that these sound more clear than I ever anticipated and the each of the chimes fit together in an intuitive way. When they ring it is not disruptive, but rather a pleasant addition to any sound.
customer_reviews.author: C McATop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing musical tones, but check with your neighbors before hanging outdoors
customer_reviews.text: The chimes are lovely and have pleasing musical tones. It is not clangy or tinny but soothing. Be sure to check any association rules before buying wind chimes. I bought the chime for a gift and it was returned to me because the next-door neighbor complained of the "noise" as soon as they were hung outdoors, which was against the neighborhood's association rules.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Dufek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounds!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite memories of my parent's house while I was growing up is their wind chime collection. It's past time to start my own collection and this was an excellent first piece! Low tones and high tones in one chime. Quality wood pieces for the top and the ringer. Sturdy strings. Even with the wind gusts that we've been experiencing lately, I wasn't worried about damage. I did bring it inside during one particularly nasty storm, but it's held up nicely to the erratic weather the Southern California desert has been facing.
customer_reviews.author: Kasee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing relaxing sound
customer_reviews.text: Ok do not hesitate in buying this wind chime. It is lightweight and the sound is amazing!! I bought copper finish to match my other items and I love it! It has tiny tube chimes inside the large one, so even with a slight breeze, you hear the relaxing tingle!! Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: We like the sound of the chimes but the chimes lasted about one month before breaking. The chimes are held in by small tack into the word and the strings are not threaded through the wood itself therefore when the string detaches from the tack it’ll come off. One strong gust of wind and the chime is history. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Being of Light

customer_reviews.title: Hurricane Michael’s  40-50 mph wind gusts cold not ring these chimes!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these wind chimes for about two months and they are well made and the tone is deep, rich and beautiful. The problem is I have only heard them chime when I rang them manually. Hurricane Michael dropped by Savannah, GA last night (October 11, 2018) with tropical storm winds gusting at 40-50 mph and I never heard the chimes ring once! They are hanging on my screen porch where they are easily exposed to unobstructed wind. There must be a design flaw if they are too heavy for 40-50 mile winds to be unable to make them chime! I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: savannahgirl

customer_reviews.title: Was so happy now so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I think I wrote a review on this after I received it @ 4/12 saying how lovely thins chime sounds. I also recommended it to friends but it’s now 6/7 and the whole thing is a mess. The pieces separating the chimes have come loose on the top so rather than beautiful music it just sounds like metal bearing together. It’s going in the trash because I have no idea how to fix it. I’m so sad because I was blissfully happy when I took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: JAW1251

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these wind chimes, one for me and another for a Christmas gift for my mother. The chimes fell apart within a month of use, the strings holding the metal tubes to the wood disconnected from the top wood portion. It looks as if the little tacks holding the string fell out or the string pulled out from under. I am unable to replace via Amazons return policy since i didn't get around to installing them until last month, which puts me way past the January cutoff date for this order. I tried contacting the company but was unable to find an option on the Amazon site.
customer_reviews.author: Todd L.

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock Chimes - Pachelbel Canon
customer_reviews.text: These wind chimes are absolutely beautiful and sound awesome! The tubes look small compared to a different (Mfg.) one that I had purchased. Was a little skeptical, but when I heard the sound it was awesome! Very melodic. I will be meditating outside listening to this. Hopefully it will sound louder than my neighbors dogs and the lawn guy! Nice replacement for the one I left behind in my previous home.
customer_reviews.author: R. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chimes built with quality and clarity in mind
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up on a whim for a Christmas gift to my family after seeing it on SlickDeals for $25. For the price, I'm very happy with my purchase. It's a beautiful sounding chime, and I suppose the tuning to Pachelbel's Canon helps, but I wouldn't know it without reading the label printed on the sail. Maybe I'm just an uncultured heathen, but it just sounds like a wind chime to me. As long as they're tuned so that none of the notes are sharp or flat from each other, I'd expect it to sound just fine.
customer_reviews.author: GallopingCow

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great and they sound beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these wind chimes!!! They sound very beautiful and would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to buy a set of wind chimes. These aren't cheaply made either!
customer_reviews.author: D. Holak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chimes, surreal sound
customer_reviews.text: The chimes sound wonderful! Out the box the chimes may seem uneven, but after a little wiggling around they balance out and hang parallel to each other. These were bought as part of an anniversary gift (8 years/bronze) and my wife loves them... Unfortunately she wanted to hang them from a very inconvenient spot... Not important... You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these wind chimes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful looking and sounding wind chimes. I never write reviews but wanted anybody thinking about buying.a wind chime to know you will not be disappointed in any of the Woodstock chimes. I love them so much that I have purchased 3 of them in the last couple weeks. There's another one I want plus I would like to try one of the Bells too but need to save up since a went a bit crazy buying so many in a short period of time. They are worth every penny and to be honest they are better in price to any others out there. Thank you Woodstock, you have a very satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhula

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought chimes last year and after leaving them out all summer through the rain, they fell apart. So I was looking for another. These chimes have a beautiful tone. I'm just concerned how they are put together with string. Just like that from last year. So I make it a habit of taking down during rain and with all the rain I don't get to enjoy them. Wish they were made from heavier fishing line or cord or something other than string that deteriorates. These are beautiful and I hope to savor them so I will continue to take them down during rain.
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Tuned Chimes
customer_reviews.text: These chimes are tuned perfectly for playing the notes of whichever piece they were chosen. I've had several of them over the last 20yrs. Depending on placement and weather conditions, they can last outside for many many years. I will always have at least one Woodstock Chime playing at my house, if not 2 or 3!!
customer_reviews.author: TLight

customer_reviews.title: Nice tone!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, clean, and carrying sound. Would have got 5 stars but I don't hear "Canon" in the tones (bought them specifically as an anniversary gift because that was my wedding music, slightly disappointing, hence 4 stars). Regardless, I'd happily buy again if were in the market for some nice sounding wind chimes, and I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tones!!
customer_reviews.text: I listened to lots of chimes before I found the ones I wanted and found the ones for me. I love them. They make so many different ones, just listen to them and find which one is pleasing to your ears. Construction is well made and hope to hear them for many years. Everyone enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Brand new in box and the wind chimes look and sound amazing. The delivery was super fast even without having ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described. Brand new in box and the wind chimes look and sound amazing. The delivery was super fast even without having a Prime account. Exceptional savings as well. I would absolutely buy from this seller again. I've had this product for over 45 days now and have had it outside on my patio. So far the product is holding up well in the rain and the weather. The weather is changing to very hot now but they are not in direct sunlight so I'm curious to see how they will be holding up.
customer_reviews.author: JWIceman

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that it had a smaller set of chimes inside the bigger ones. The sounds are clear and and very melodious. I can hear it with even the slightest breeze, which is wonderful for someone with a pronounced high frequency hearing loss like me.
customer_reviews.author: Onizneb

customer_reviews.title: 😢 Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited ordering these chimes. I love chimes and have a few. When I first got them they sounded wonderful! Within the first couple of weeks the little nails holding the strings in place were falling out. For the price I’m disappointed. Update...... these chimes are literally falling apart! Strings have broken, most nails have fallen out and we had to fix. Sent message to seller with NO response. We have very little wind, so they are not being abused. Very disappointed considering the price!
customer_reviews.author: babyhounddogs

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for me for my birthday. I've had them hanging outside in the snow, wind, and rain for almost a year now. They still look and sound great. Honestly, one of my favorite birthday presents :)
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I love wind chimes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend. I got to hear them for the first time last week. They really sound lovely. Woodstock is the only brand I buy and ask for as gifts. I love wind chimes. I have a very large yard and I tuck them in unexpected places. No matter where I am on my property, I can hear the sweet music. I leave them out all winter long!
customer_reviews.author: house4paws

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic chimes.
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE these chimes. Not too loud or obnoxious, but loud enough to soothe the soul. The trick is where you hang them. My husband chose the perfect spot on the tree outside that is in between the houses where the wind blows a lot. We can hear them inside even with the windows closed. Would definitely purchase again. Have had them for six months through summer, rain, wind storms, and now freezing temps and they are fine. They have handled the weather without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Patton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: I only had it hanging for three week before it fell apart. Late February to to the March 2020. No option for return to replace it. We haven’t even had strong winds, plus it was hanging on my patio, right next to another one (different company) and its still hanging. I have had wind chimes for years in the back yard, this is the first one Iv’e received that hasn’t lasted, less than one month.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hermans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound. Amazing music.
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Pachelbet's Canon. This chime creates the same sound while creating different music. And this was a christmas present from my daughter. Love it. Both the sound and the music. So I'm now looking for a nearby spot that produces the best sound and most interesting music. And video this chime doing all it does. Then adding ambient synth tracks to see if we can do a new variation of Pachelbet's work. Wish me well.
customer_reviews.author: IseeUvideo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful workmanship & lovely sound
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful workmanship and lovely sound. I can't say I can hear Pachabel's Canon, but the chimes do sound beautiful. The workmanship that went into the materials and assembly of these chimes was impeccible. Ive seen lots of chimes atbsimilarbpricepoints, andvthe quality was no where near as good as these. Was most impressed with the care instructions that came and the fact that I could register my chimes and can obtain spare parts or send my chimes in for repair or refurbishment. Sorry about picture, taken through my sewing room window. My next set of chimes will most certainly come from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Patch

customer_reviews.title: Best Wind Chimes
customer_reviews.text: These wind chimes are relaxing and sound so beautiful on a windy day in Arizona! This is my second wind chimes from this seller. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SBSAZ

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Tone
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase anything that might disturb the peace of my backyard but I am so pleased with this product. The opposite of intrusive. It add an ambiance my husband and I enjoy very much.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Paget

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I highly recommend it. I love the black and silver and it makes such beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.author: Janinemarie

customer_reviews.title: Music to my ears
customer_reviews.text: Though this is called a wind chime, it is more than that...it is music to the ears. Well made, pleasing to the eye..but the sound is the draw, beautiful, ethereal, imagine a monastic cathedral echoing through time. Unique, do not pass this one up...each passing breeze is a symphony.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: The sound is very beautiful, and in the middle of the large chime ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had Woodstock chimes for decades, but this is the first set that is anything other than the silver aluminum chime tubes. The sound is very beautiful, and in the middle of the large chime tubes hang smaller, shorter chime tubes.....they give a "tinkly" sound. It's like having 2 chimes! Really lovely.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Modestly priced, elegant in appearance, finely tuned as advertised....we felt this was an amazing find on Amazon. With a breath of wind, the chimes peal, and the notes carry across the street so that those walking in the early evening have paused for a moment to listen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite....beautiful....clear....classic sound...love these Woodstock chimes. This was a wedding gift. I personally have 6 in my yard and for three years summer and winter their melodic sounds bring comfort and joy. If you don't own at least one in your life time it's been a life ill spent.
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing really special about these wind chimes. I was hopeful for a deeper tone and that I could actual hear a hint of Canon, but they’re really just a standard wind chime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From day one I loved it, from the purity of the tones
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area that gets a lot of wind, so many of my neighbors have a variety of wind chimes. I must have listened to twenty different sets before choosing this set. From day one I loved it, from the purity of the tones, to the range, and the wonderful unpredictable music that lets me know the wind is picking up. I feared getting bored with it, but now months later it is just the opposite. I hear it now and it always gives me a lift to my day. Even my UPS driver likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chime
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful, I was very pleased when I opened the box and even more so upon hearing them. The chimes have such a pretty sound...... not a " tinkling " cheap sound but a truly stunNing sound.. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sparklystar

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've ever purchased a windchime. I've had it hanging in the front of my house for about three months now. I haven't had any problem with it at all. I love the melodic sound it produces. Not too loud and easy on the ears. I love listening to it when the wind kicks up.
customer_reviews.author: Phileous P. Schmoo

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my mom for mother's day last year.
customer_reviews.text: My mom is a very picky woman. I had no idea what to get her but this worked out perfectly. She will call me up and say "Shh, listen. Isn't that pretty?" While letting me hear these wind chimes, so I approve of this 100% :D
customer_reviews.author: Nixy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tones. Comforting to hear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chimes a memorial for my 16-year old granddaughter who was killed by a drunk driver in the summer of 2019. I have them on my front porch so I can hear them in my living room where I spend most of my time. They are such a source of comfort to me and the music the chimes produce is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great quality gift for family, staff, or yourself!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of these over the years for myself and family, and they're always top quality. Purchased six of this model for staff members at work this year, and all were very surprised & loved them. Can't go wrong with Woodstock Chimes. They'll last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Teufel Hunden 83

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Woodstock Windchimes are one of the few out there that are tuned perfectly and worth the money. The beautiful, clear and resonant musical tones are very soothing and always true. This is true quality at work. I now own seven different tunes from Woodstock Windchimes. I have some that have been up and hanging outside for at least 5 years and none of them have come apart. The tunes are easily recognizable. Pachelbel really sounds like Pachelbel. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Biking momma

customer_reviews.title: not clanky like your walmart chimes
customer_reviews.text: Produces a very lovely sound that after a year of ownership never gets old and tired. It's a very deep rich sound , not clanky like your walmart chimes. It also looks gorgeous! YMMV, but this wind chime for me has survived some really hot summers and rainy cold winters. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Choo

customer_reviews.title: Sound that complements the wind
customer_reviews.text: From a light breeze to gusty winds, this wind chime has quickly become my, my family's, and my neighbor's favorite. Beautifully and expertly tuned, the two chime sets produce an endless variety of notes and chords that complement and enhance each other. We chose the bronze color which seems to fit with our more natural surroundings--a Pachelbel Canon wind chime by any other color would sound just as sweet! Made my Christmas shopping very easy this year!
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM C.

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a number of their chimes directly from the company's website. When I saw this on Amazon at less than half the price of similar chimes I jumped on it. These are very high quality and will last for years. The company also offers a repair center if in time your chime needs some sort of repair. I highly recommend any of their products.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: 4 years after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my yard exposed to pretty extreme weather for 4 years and it is holding up well. i love the sound so much that I moved it close to my bedroom window so that I can hear it on a soft evening breeze. The tone is great, not high or tinny, but very soothing. While I do not hear tones from Pachelbel's Canon, I most definitely hear the notes from "Lovely Rita, Metermaid"!
customer_reviews.author: B. GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wind chimes and received them this week - they are absolutely beautiful!!! I've loved wind chimes since I was a teen and have always had them around. In fact, I even used to hang a miniature one from my car's rearview mirror. These, however, are the best I've ever owned. The material is high quality and the sound is so clear and beautiful. I'm thinking about buying another set to replace the one I currently have at my mom's house. I did go to the website which allows you to listen to the chimes and that's a great feature. If you like wind chimes, I highly recommend these - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SS Paradise

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Woodstock Chimes are an absolute Joy to the ears! If you listen to Pachebel's Canon in D Major and then listen to these chimes, you can definitely hear the notes, it's truly amazing! I would recommend these wind chimes to music lovers everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. KnowItAll

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chime! I hesitated because it was more than I wanted to spend, but am so glad I took the plunge. The sound is unbelievably beautiful. The tone is rich and soothing and not at all too bright or harsh like many chimes are. You won't be disappointed! it would be wonderful housewarming gift!
customer_reviews.author: SwissMiss

customer_reviews.title: Wind Chime Falls Apart -  waste of money!!!  Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed in this purchase. The wind chime arrived in seemingly good condition and sounded beautiful. Within a day or two of it hanging outside on my back patio, I noticed that two of the chimes were hanging side by side. I realized that one of the nails holding the strings in place had fallen out ( wind/weather is not to blame). Soon after, the string slipped out from under another nail. The wind chime is completely useless at this point and falling apart. What's worse is the terrible customer service. I have been unable to get anyone on the phone or to reply to an email. I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: ParkerSiwyLiebl

customer_reviews.title: Truly musical
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these chimes in the past for another family member and was blown away by the sound quality. As a musician, I appreciate the attention to detail that goes into pitching the tubing and making these chimes truly musical instead of just pleasant noise. When someone else asked for chimes this year, I knew without a doubt I would be buying another set of Woodstock chimes.
customer_reviews.author: KM in NC

customer_reviews.title: Soft, gentle and very pleasant sound.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a gift for a friend and were there when she put them up. These are some of the most pleasant sounding wind chimes I have heard. The sound is very soft -- not at all jarring like some chimes can be. Don't know the longevity, but they seem very well made and we are expecting they will hold up well. I don't expect anyone would think they would hang these up and hear Pachelbel's Canon, but just in case, be aware they are tuned to the notes, but the striking of those notes is random.
customer_reviews.author: JoeInTampa

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock chimes groove with the motion of the wind.
customer_reviews.text: The Woodstock chime has a real nice rhythm in the gentlest breeze. The sun rays caress the bronze chimes giving them a sparkling golden reflection. The designer put his heart in creating chime that give peace and calmness to your soul. If you like getting off the rollercoaster and want to unwind this chime is for you. Relax because it's at a price you can afford. My wife valued this gift so much she put her loving arms around me and gave me a big hug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this chime
customer_reviews.text: I love this chime! I wish I would have purchased it years ago. I'm looking forward to adding one or two more Woodstock chimes to my yard. Beautiful tone. Update: I needed customer service at Woodstock & I just need to let everybody know that their customer service is EXCELLENT. I'm very pleased with this company and their beautiful chimes. Happy Happy Customer :)
customer_reviews.author: debra white

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift for the gardener in your life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this windchime as a gift for my mom, who’s a gardener and music lover. The tones are so beautiful and rich, and the sound really carries. I can’t wait to see her reaction, and to hear how nice they sound in her garden this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully tuned
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as a house gift for friends, and they made a big hit. I think we'll buy a set for ourselves. They are carefully tuned to create a harmonious sound, not an annoying jangle. There is a set of long tubes for soothing low notes and another of smaller ones to add sonic highlights. You can listen on the Woodstock Chimes site and chose your favorite soundscape.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a mothers day gift. My mom loves lower tones and heavier pipes when it comes to windchimes. This one was perfect. Very well made, with care instructions included. I know other reviewers were complaining that the nylon ropes broke...this one came with rubber stoppers in the pipes to help prevent this and also recommendations to spray them with an all weather protective coating 1-2 times per year to help prevent this. Beautiful color, beautiful sound, mom loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived tangled and the top wooden part is warped
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this item. First of all the top is warped. It took me over an hour to untangle it as it came all tangled up. It does have a beautiful sound but for the price it should have been perfect. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Animamundi9

customer_reviews.title: Really great sounds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of Woodstock Chimes in 2007. After 13 years the weather had taken it's toll and I had to replace them. Now days your lucky if a product last 13 months or even 13 days. P.S. these really make great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sound, initial defect but company quick to replace.
customer_reviews.text: 2 months after hanging this on the back porch, a pin holding the cord to the top plate has popped out so two of the chimes simply rest against each other. It was beautiful while it worked though. Edit: Still under warranty and they are sending a new one and took the time to ask for pics to help their QC dept. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: E. DuBois

customer_reviews.title: spectacular
customer_reviews.text: I have had many Woodstock Chimes over the years. I find them calming and rejuvenating at the same time. On days when there is no wind I will encourage them to play. The best gift I have given o myself in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another one for my collection
customer_reviews.text: Just lovely, I hadn't realized this was a twofer. Lol! There is a smaller chime inside of one giving you a delicate and medium sound in one. Looks and sounds lovely on my patio. Woodstock chimes are definitely my favorite hand tuned chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased numerous wind chimes over the years but none have had the sound quality of these, they are amazing and you absolutely have to hear one to believe how they sound. Not only do they sound amazing they are beautifully made, real craftsmanship at work here. They are well worth the money and should last for many years to come. Only wind chimes we would buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Shafferfarm

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that it needs hurricane winds to get it to chime.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the chimes is very good. However it seems you need hurricane winds to get it to chime. Seems the wood weight may not be big enough or something. Bought it for my fiance for her to hang outside her bedroom window but even in a decent wind doesn't chime or not very loudly. We even moved it to various places to catch more wind and nothing seemed to help. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Fuji 2

customer_reviews.title: Just great peaceful tones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for myself and was pleasantly surprised that it actually has two wind-chimes in one. A mini wind-chime at the top and then a main chime around it. Together they sound so quiet and peaceful.
customer_reviews.author: TrueHonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Ugh - not good quality!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I have 6 different wind chimes in my yard. Some several years old and all are holding up great. These were purchased end of May 2019. They have already fallen apart. Very disappointed. Looked for some type of warranty but could not find one. I can see if these were older but a few months - perhaps I got a defective one. Definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sounds and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is such a lovely wind chime. It looks great and has beautiful sounds. I have another set of chimes on my patio, also a “tuned” chime, and though they’re very different they harmonize beautifully even when it’s very windy. And my neighbor loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L

customer_reviews.title: Pachelbel Canon Chime is a very nice addition to my porch
customer_reviews.text: Super nice sound. I did not realize that there was a smaller set of chimes in the center. The smaller chimes rarely ring, so I'm a bit disappointed. However, the entire sound is so very lovely. I'm so happy to have purchased these. Very easy to unpack and hang.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chime/beautiful sound
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a friend. She loved it! In fact, Pachelbel was the opening song in her wedding and she loved it even more! I am planning to purchase one for myself as all of my chimes are small. This will be a great addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: thewife

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chime although because its made of quality heavy materials it takes a little more wind to move it. It's in memory of my doggo Lili. I think of her when it chimes beautifully in the breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Opinionator

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These chimes sound so Beautiful! Really impressed by the sou d and how well they're constructed. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful depth of sound - lower/fuller tones
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these chimes. I bought this set for a family member for their cabin a few years and they absolutely loved them. The wind chimes are still going strong to this day. I’m not a fan of the higher pitched chimes as they tend to give me more anxiety than peace. These chimes have a very soothing depth of sound that produces lower, fuller tones. I plan to buy a set for myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Derek D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gifts!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my grand daughter's husband in the unexpected passing of his brother. He loved it! I have 2, one for the passing of my husband and one in passing of my mother. I love listening to them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Chimes
customer_reviews.text: I have several sets of these Woodstock chimes now and have never been disappointed. The craftsmanship is wonderful and their melodies very soothing. I have never had a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ninevin

customer_reviews.title: Great chimes
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/17/16: These chimes are still hanging where I first put them with no wear or tear. They have survived two winters of very windy snowstorms. Another cheaper wind chime I'd bought at the same time has one tube out of six still hanging. These chimes sound beautiful- they have a very pretty tone. I've had the chimes hanging on my front porch for 18 months, where they get a lot of wind, and no strings have fallen apart yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken....so playing a sad tune
customer_reviews.text: Chimes were only hanging for about a month before it broke. The string holding a few chimes pulled out of the base. There was no crazy storm or anything to come through. It’s a lovely sound and I hope the retailer/manufacturer would replace but I haven’t figured out how to contact them. Help please.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Gal

customer_reviews.title: Pachelbel Canon Chime 5 Star Plus
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting off this purchase far too long and finally ordered the Woodstock Chimes. They are exactly what I've been wanting - simple silver with black and the sound is Sooooo rich and wonderful. The melody fills me with joy every day as I hear them outside my kitchen window with even a light breeze. Just don't hang them in a too protected area -- that's what I did initially and they didn't make a sound even during a furious wind storm! As someone else said, it like hearing music on a surround sound system. And such a deal, to boot! I would not hesitate to give as a gift. Amazon.com is the place to shop, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Starlet

customer_reviews.title: Ding dong delight
customer_reviews.text: Well sounding wind chimes but, as with all these chimes, durability is a question. All seem to last a year before the fish line connectors fail. I repair them by using picture frame wire.....
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnson MD

customer_reviews.title: The Chimes are TOTALLY Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing these for SO long! I thought they were beautiful and I love Pachelbel Canon. But I was hesitant to spend the money. Don’t wait! LOL! They are so gorgeous in person. And I melt when I hear the music when the wind blows them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Burbage

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this for me for Christmas. It now hangs on our back patio. I love the sound it makes when the breeze happens. Very musical. Much nicer than many wind chimes.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is tuned to Pachabel Cannon in D. I bought for us for our 25th wedding anniversary. This so the song I walked down the aisle to. It has gorgeous sound. We will buy another chime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Heinze

customer_reviews.title: Well made, melodic  but can be annoying
customer_reviews.text: These wind chimes are melodic, well made, and worth the money. The only problem is they are loud and when the patio door is open on a windy night they can be annoying even to me. My neighbors haven’t commented. I put a rubber band around them at night so they don’t keep us up. They are very melodic though!
customer_reviews.author: SilverLady

customer_reviews.title: Best chimes on the market
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I can not believe the sound these chimes make. I expected just some ordinary chimes. These things are ridiculous. If you are in the market buy these. You will be more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: brwillia

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last falling apart after a year
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very pretty, after 13 months the strings started breaking and the finish is all worn off where the center piece meets the chimes. If it was made to last it would definitely be a five star product but it’s short lived.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mom

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock is the best
customer_reviews.text: Of course they're good. I've been buying Woodstock chimes for 40 years. Always beautiful and they last in the weather for at least 10 years. The wood eventually fails; however, you can buy replacement wood for the chimes which last forever.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: W O W
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow. This wind is chime touches my heart the minute I took it out of the box. It is absolutely magical sounding. It brings chills. I whole heartedly recommend this chime to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sounds and pretty appearance
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sounds. High quality chimes. I will definitely be buying from Woodstock again! This is my second set of chimes from them. I'm thrilled with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Soothing sounds
customer_reviews.text: I got this chime hung up over the holidays. I love the Pachelbel Canon in D and is the basis for the tones of this chime. Lovely soothing sounds and goes well with the Chime of Earth which I also have on my patio. Quite a breeze today and I’m really enjoying the music!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MUCH BETTER than anticipated. Sound isn't too soft or too loud, absolutely beautiful tone. Wish I had bought it earlier. We have enjoyed it so much, we bought one for a relative who also says how much she loves it. We actually hope it's windy to hear it more often. We have it hanging on our back porch, and the sound volume is perfect--we can hear it inside the home faintly, but if we open the door, it's not too loud to be annoying. HIGHLY recommend, easy to assemble and just beautiful tone.
customer_reviews.author: s0der

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality when the strings that hold up the chime come undone from under the nail after only six months. Also- the black paint did not hold up well being exposed to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound, very loud
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sound, loved the mini chimes in the center. Unfortunately I had to return this because it was too loud. Sounded amazing but I was afraid I was driving my neighbors crazy. Couldn't hold a conversation on the porch if there was a slight breeze.
customer_reviews.author: *BeckyC*

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT LOUD ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed chimes over the years;but these are almost quite. I live beside a lake and have lots of breeze most days to listen to the chimes.I have good hearing, but these chimes I have to be within 5-10 feet of them to hear them.Good chrisp chimes should be heard much futher.I have noticed the paddle goes round and round a lot rather than use the wind to sway the clapper to ring the chimes the pladle looses its sway ability.I would not recommend this product.NOT ENOUGH CHIME.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Smith

product_meta.title: Woodstock Chimes PCC The Original Guaranteed Musically Tuned Chime Pachelbel Canon, Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverGUARANTEED MUSICALLY TUNED PACHELBEL CANON CHIME – SILVER. This chime is tuned to the soft melody of Johann Pachelbel's celebrated Canon in D. With its graceful melody and stately tempo, it is a popular choice as a wedding processional, for within its measures we hear the sounds of hope, joy, love and promise. The clever design incorporates 4 small rods that harmonize beautifully with the 6 chime tubes. PRODUCT FEATURES. Measuring 32-inches in overall length (total hanging length is measured from top of gather ring to bottom of wind catcher), this chime features an ash wood top with a black finish that is weather-resistant, 6 high-polish silver aluminum tubes and 4 black aluminum rods that will not rust when exposed to the elements. EASY CUSTOMIZATION. The removable wind catcher can be taken to a trophy shop, printer or jeweler to be engraved or silk-screened. QUALITY THAT IS GUARANTEED. Woodstock stands behind every product they make with a one-year warranty and a lifetime tuning guarantee on their musically tuned chimes. WOODSTOCK THE ORIGINAL MUSICALLY TUNED CHIME. Tuned to beautiful melodies and scales from around the world and available in a wide range of styles, songs and sizes, you can choose the Woodstock Chime that speaks to your soul. HOW IT ALL BEGAN. More than 30-years ago, the first Woodstock Chime was created by Grammy award-winning musician Garry Krista from an aluminum lawn chair he found in a landfill. As a professional musician and instrument designer, he was fascinated by the Scales of Olympus, a 7th century pentatonic scale that can't be played on a modern piano. Garry had the idea to cut and tune the lawn chair chime tubes to the exact frequency of the ancient scale. The resulting Chimes of Olympus was the first Woodstock Chime and is still one of our bestselling wind chimes. Garry and his wife Diane founded Woodstock Percussion, Inc. in 1979 and it remains a family-owned business in New York's Hudson Valley.
feature_bullets: MUSICALLY TUNED to the beloved sounds of Johann Pachelbel's Canon in D, a graceful melody with a stately tempo, it is a popular choice as a wedding processional, for within its measures we hear the sounds of hope, joy, love and promise; lifetime tuning guarantee
Dimensions: measures 32-inches in overall length - total hanging length is measured from top of gather ring to bottom of wind catcher

Expertly crafted: features an ash wood top with a Black finish that is weather-resistant; 6 high-polish Silver aluminum tubes and 4 Black aluminum rods that will not rust when exposed to the elements; removable wind catcher for easy customization

Easy to customize: Woodstock Chimes does not offer engraving services, but the removable wind catcher can be taken to a personalization store, Trophy Shop, printer or jeweler to be engraved or silk-screened

Quality you can trust: created by Grammy award-winning musician and instrument designer Garry vistas, Woodstock Chimes offers a unique variety of high quality, affordable chimes, gongs, musical instruments and more that inspire, entertain and bring pleasure to people of all ages

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
